title: Matrix Exponentiation
statement: You are given a square matrix of size n X n and an integer power p. Your task is to compute the matrix raised to the power p modulo 1e9 + 7.
input_format:
The first line contains two integers n and p - the dimension of the square matrix and the power.
The next n lines each contain n integers representing the matrix elements.
output_format: Print the resulting matrix after raising the input matrix to power p modulo 1e9 + 7. Each element in the output should be space-separated. Print each row on a new line.
